translationtableentry.text: I want to help you but currently you don't have enough gold. Please bring at least 2000 gold in the townhall of Londinium before you ask for help.
translationtableentry.result: Quiero ayudarte, pero ahora no dispones de oro suficiente. Por favor, antes de pedirme algo, recauda al menos 2000 piezas de oro y tráelas al foro de Londinium.

translationtableentry.text: A general from a Roman province - 6000 gold
translationtableentry.result: Un general de una provincia romana - 6000 oro

translationtableentry.text: Your general is waiting in the townhall of Londinium.
translationtableentry.result: Tu general está esperando en el foro de Londinium.
